definition[0]: an extreme religious group that is not part of an established religion
definition[1]: a fashionable belief, idea, or attitude that influences people’s lives
example[0]: Diet, exercise ... It’s all part of this cult of self-improvement.
definition[2]: a group of people who are very interested in a particular thing
example[1]: O'Brien has a cult of devoted readers.
definition[3]: a system of religious beliefs and practices
